verses.name: 1 Chronicles 4:10
verses.text: And Jabez called on the God of Israel, saying, Oh that thou wouldest bless me indeed, and enlarge my coast, and that thine hand might be with me, and that thou wouldest keep me from evil, that it may not grieve me! And God granted him that which he requested.

verses.name: 1 Chronicles 4:11
verses.text: And Chelub the brother of Shuah begat Mehir, which was the father of Eshton.

verses.name: 1 Chronicles 4:12
verses.text: And Eshton begat Beth–rapha, and Paseah, and Tehinnah the father of Ir–nahash. These are the men of Rechah.

verses.name: 1 Chronicles 4:13
verses.text: And the sons of Kenaz; Othniel, and Seraiah: and the sons of Othniel; Hathath.
